summary: The module provides a sample application that sets up and runs chat‑based large language models via LangChain, supporting OpenAI and optional Replicate back‑ends. It defines utility routines to send prompts and retrieve model replies, and is structured to work with the Agenta experiment‑tracking framework.
business_intent: To illustrate how developers can quickly configure, invoke, and test chat LLM services within a managed experiment environment, enabling rapid prototyping and evaluation of different model providers.
